des: A video series all about adapting to and thriving in new environments. Made by the people that went through it all.

content.name: Dear '22
content.des: Some words of wisdom to our dearest Class of 2022, on how to survive and thrive in your first year at Minerva.
content.alt: Natalia in a laid back position, leaning back, adjusting her hair
